name: REFERRAL_REASONS
description: Contains the reasons for each referral.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the referral reason.

columns.name: REFERRAL_REASON_OTHER
columns.description: The comment entered when the user chooses "Other" as the reason for referral. If the comment surpasses 60 characters, it will be truncated to 60.
